category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ConfigureOutParentProcess
preference.preference_description: This preference is obsolete and replaced by the preference "typeAndRuleForProcessConfiguration". Configures Parent processes depending on their child occurrences. Accepted values are: * true: The parent process will be configured out if all of its children operations or subprocesses are configured out. This is the default value. * false: The parent process will not be configured out.
